content.launch_tip_in_content:
If you can't see a diamond popup dialog,
make sure that Auto.js is allowed to display pop-up window


Version 4.1.1 Alpha2 is recommended.
4.1.1 Alpha2 Download: https://github.com/Ericwyn/Auto.js/releases/tag/V4.1.1.Alpha2

content.page_lc_del_desc:
Are you sure to delete {0} ?
The operation cannot undo.
content.page_lc_import_desc: The local sheet folder is located to {0}. {1} Just copy your sheet files into this folder. Warning： SkyStudio uses {2} charset to read and write file. Please make sure the charset of external sheet is the same as SkyStudio uses.
content.page_lc_kctip_desc:
Version 15 adds support for scores of instruments with different key positions (8 and 15), which use different coordinate data. 
 Currently stored in local music (externally imported or downloaded from shared music before version 15), they have no key position information, and skyautoplayerscript cannot confirm whether it is an 8-key score or a 15 key score. 
The shared music score information has been updated. Now the downloaded shared music score already contains the music score key position information, so there is no need to set it again. 
When you click the start playing button, if there is no key position information, a dialog box will pop up to select the music score key position, and skyautoplayerscript will save the key position information to the score. 
If the wrong key position information is set for some reason, you can long press the score to reset it. 

P. S.: it is necessary to reset the coordinates of key 15.
content.page_lc_load_failed_r1: Is the charset of this sheet is UTF16-LE.

content.page_sc_download_success:
Download successful: {0}
Please press refresh button in local sheet page.
content.page_sc_upload_title: How to upload your local sheet
content.page_sc_upload_desc:
There are two ways：

①Mail to beamiscool@qq.com with attachment file.
(Sheet description is optional.)

②Pull request to StageGuard/SkyAutoplayerScript

③PM to @StageGuard in CoolApk with sheet link.
Put your sheet file to shared_sheets folder and modify shared_sheets.json

Warning: If the sheet is not translated or composed by yourself, you must gain the permission of original composer or translator.

Welcome to expand the shared sheet list!
content.page_sc_upload_ca_not_exist: Application CookApk is not installed on your device
content.page_sc_announcement_desc: All online sheet can be found in GitHub github.com/StageGuard/SkyAutoPlayerScript All sheet in this list is only be played in SkyAutoplayerScript If you want to upload to other websites, please gain the permission of original composer or translator or following their announcement!
